name: chat-history-conv
description: ChatGPTとClaudeのチャット履歴をMarkdownに変換するCLIツール

scripts.build:all: bun run typecheck && bun run build
scripts.conv:chatgpt: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/chatgpt/conversations.json -o data/md/chatgpt --format chatgpt
scripts.conv:all: bun run conv:chatgpt && bun run conv:claude
scripts.conv:chatgpt:watch: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/chatgpt/conversations.json -o data/md/chatgpt --format chatgpt 2>&1 | tee chatgpt-warnings.log
scripts.conv:claude:watch: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/claude/conversations.json -o data/md/claude 2>&1 | tee claude-warnings.log
